title: ‘I’m Still Experiencing Too Much Pain in My Rib’: Now Another Race Cancellation for Mathieu van der Poel
content:
World champion’s perfect winter season hit by injury and schedule disruption, with Sunday's Dendermonde World Cup the latest race affected.

Read the full article at ‘I’m Still Experiencing Too Much Pain in My Rib’: Now Another Race Cancellation for Mathieu van der Poel on Velo.
author: sstokes
